Title: Python Developer
TagLine: A passionate tinkerer with a positive "can-do" attitude.
ShortBio: A python software developer with over 6 years experience in building software, automated workflows and REST APIs for the media industry. I'm a fast learning and modest self-starter who is eager to get involved with various technologies that will enable me to contribute to other areas such as DevOps, Frontend Development, Data Science and Full Stack.
AboutMe: As a self-taught programmer with over 6 years of professional experience, I got my start in the industry by automating basic file operations for a television production company.

Since then, as a passionate tinkerer with a positive "can-do" attitude, I've worked on a variety of projects including audio fingerprinting and detection for radio and TV stations, image recognition for finding logos and patterns on live TV to most recently identifying and fulfilling a critical business need within our organization to develop and maintain our own file upload portal. This allowed the business to cut costs dramatically for the submission of Radio & TV adverts to local broadcasters.

My expertise lies in working with Python, MySQL and building REST APIs using Flask and Django. I am a fast learning and modest self-starter who is eager to get involved with various technologies that will enable me to contribute to other areas such as DevOps, Frontend Development, Data Science and Full Stack.

I am a team player and enjoy mentoring my junior colleagues, helping them find their strengths and motivating them to take charge of their own skills development. I'm also a hard worker, easy going and a nice guy to have around.

With a well-rounded knowledge and experience in IT and programming workflows, I am confident that I can bring invaluable growth to any team and make a significant contribution to the company's success.
I am looking for an intermediate backend software development role at a small to medium-sized company with experienced and supportive professionals from diverse backgrounds.
SkillsOverview: I'm most comfortable working with Python, MySQL, Django and Flask and I work frequently with many other backend technologies.
I taught myself C# in less than a month in order to help on additional projects with a development team we acquired during a merger.
I'm keen on learning Java next and would also like to get involved in Android development in the near future.
CoreSkills: Critical & Analytical Thinking, Problem Solving, Debugging

A human-shaped "Sounding Board" that can take ideas from ambiguous to actionable.
